Hello, my name is CAFE MARCELLINO

I'm a web designer

I am a self taught with 6 months experience. I have a passion in web development and look for opportunity to join a new challenge. I have learned and built mini projects with basic web development such as html, css, javascript, Reactjs, django, bootstrap, tailwind, firebase and more...
I believe in long life learning and practicing will lead me to become a professional web developer as my goal
